mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(reviewno, contentsno, memberno, content, passwd, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate) VALUES(review_seq.nextval, #{contentsno}, #{memberno}, #{content}, #{passwd}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT reviewno, contentsno, memberno, content, passwd, rdate FROM review ORDER BY reviewno DESC

SELECT m.id, r.reviewno, r.contentsno, r.memberno, r.content, r.passwd, r.rdate, r.file1, r.file1saved, r.thumb1, r.size1 FROM member m, review r WHERE (m.memberno = r.memberno) AND r.contentsno=#{contentsno} ORDER BY r.reviewno DESC
SELECT reviewno, contentsno, memberno, content, passwd, rdate FROM review WHERE memberno=#{memberno} ORDER BY reviewno ASC
SELECT reviewno, contentsno, memberno, content, passwd, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate FROM review WHERE reviewno = #{reviewno}
